1.content:
Ben had always been messing around with his watch lately until one day.......

"Hey dufus what are you doing?"asked Gwen.

"Non of your bussiness twerp"countered Ben as he quickly leaves the scene.

Gwen stood there puzzled then she continued to browse through her laptop.

At the back of the Rustbucket Ben continued messing with the Omnitrix.

Beep the watch sounded and then came a new operation on the Omnitrix.
It reads "Alien Physical Modification".

Ben who was very eager push the command for the new operation.There the watch shows the image of the alien and their physical state and right beside the image lies a button Increase Muscle Mass (STRENGTH).

Em...... Ben said "Now which Alien should I test it on"


(Bear in mind Stinkfly, Upgrade, Cannonbolt, and Grey Matter can't be used in the story for personal reasons)
1.title: Connundrum

11.content: Ben quickley turnes the dial to fourarms. He noticed the dial turned...
11.title: Fourarm

111.content: Four arms clothes replaced ben's as he got bigger, more muscled. Then something crossed ben's mind, he looked at his sides. He didn't have the extra pair of arms. He reached up to feel the back of his head. He still felt hair. Just as he lifted up his other arm, the other two burst out of his sides. His skin now four arms red. He was now growing taller. He guessed he was at eight feet now. Not as tall as four arms.He was enjoying the growth. He looked down at his body, he saw his feet, they were not two toed. "That's odd," he said. He continued to look at his body. His abs now showing under his shirt. "Cool," he thought. He "walked" over to the lake to see himself. When he got their, he saw his reflection. He was surprised. He still had "human" feet. He was about 16 feet tall, taller than four arms. He had a very large, very visible 6-pack. Veins were also visible. He did a bicep flexing, the veins bulging even more through his thick skin. He looked at his face, he was even more surprised.He still had his hair, but it was a bit shaggier. He had four arms eyes, but only two of them. He had become a humanoid four arms. Ben wanted to test his new form. He ran over to the nearest tree and picked it up with ease, then threw it. "I'm so strong now," Ben's new deep four arms voice said. "I wonder when I'm going to time out. He looked over to his shoulder and saw the omnitrix piece wasn't on either shoulder. Ben was stuck.... forever.
111.title: ben bigger

choices: the tingling goes to his head
112.content: Ben pressed down on the omnitrix.With a green flash he was four arms. Then he felt this tingling sensation in all of four arms muscles. They all began to grow! When he was finished, He was 18 ft. tall large muscles everywhere and ready to fight.
112.title: purple omnitrix

12.content:
Ben was trying to search an alien he can use. However, he can't find a good one.

"Man, I don't know which one to take and this is so awesome", Ben said. He struggled to find a good one but he can not. Then, Diamondhead caught his eye, and thought whether to use it.

"Hmm, this alien should be good", said Ben. He pressed it and the Omnitrix turns into a different color.
12.title: Diamondhead

121.content:
A symbol of an arm flexing appears on the Omnitrix screen... Then the screen opens up Diamond Head body chart... And an added option was added to the side of the Omnitrix, the option reads Increase Mass...

How much?
121.title: Red

choices: He decides to test his power
124.content:
Suddenly, Ben felt change around his body. Diamond head's clothes (see this site if you don't know what it looks like- http://images3.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20...) began to replace those of Ben's.

His arms, legs, and chest began to tremendously grow. His arms and legs grew to the size of tree trunks while his biceps, triceps, and pectorals grew to the size of large exercise balls While he began to develop a 12 pack on his abs and huge muscles on his legs. His veins began to appear on his muscles and skin bulging out. By the time he was done, Ben (as Diamondhead) was much taller than he used to be and at least 12 feet tall.

But Ben still looked like human; the only changes were that was he was made of the same material as Diamondhead, much taller and bulkier. He was now a humanoid Diamondhead.
124.title: Blue

13.content: I'll think I will add some muscle on heatblast to make him stronger then four arms. Ben quickly found heatblast and add more muscle then four arms on heat blast. He then push ok button to finish it. Then Gwen comes in and tell him......
13.title: Heatblast

131.content: Ben immediately presses down on the omnitrix. In a green flash he became Heatblast, then he felt a tingling sensation. He began to grow taller more muscled. He voice turning deep. Then, 2 more arms burst out of his side. "Cool," he said, then he ran to...
131.title: that grandpa is in trouble

choices: MAX up Heatblast muscle with Omnitrix
Omnitrix Cant seem to change Ben back
132.content:
After he had finished reconstructing Heatblast's physique in the omnitrix, Gwen came to him and told him that the Forever Knights are attacking Granpa Max whom is taking shelter inside the Rustbucket. Ben and Gwen rushed toward the Rustbucket. As they dashed there Ben watched as the figure of Heatblast in the Omnitrix began to enlarged in a 2D perspective. As they reach there, a beam was shot to their direction. Ben and Gwen evades the shot by jump to the opposite side. Ben lands infront of the Forever Knights King."Well well well. If it isn't the great Ben Tennyson. Now how do you intend to stop me ha?"said the King in a cheerful tone."Like this! Its hero time" Ben said as he turn the dial on the new and improved Heatblast annd slammed the omnitrix.

BOOOM!!!

Ray of green light fills the area. As the light began to fade there stood Heatblast with the same physique, nothing changed.

"Aww man!! The watch didnt work!!" While Ben was complaining, the King turn on his protective armor and dashed toward Heatblast knocking the brain out of him.

Heatblast was recovering from the severe concussion was kicked again by the King.

"Now you are finished!!! HAHAHAHA!!!" said the King.

As Heatblast was about to fade out from the excess beating, a surge of energy fills him up as to a warm recovering tingle fills him up.

Heatblast body began to grow in a medium phase. Heatblast's arm which was once skinny was beginning to bulge with muscle and power making it grow to the point where in his gravel skin like state looks like a mountain of muscle, rock hard muscle!

Next Heatblast's chest and body area began to develop mountainuous proportion of muscle which almost make him seemed like an immobile musclebound hero except that in his growth, the body had grown taller and longer too which would free grant movement.

Finally his lower area where was beginning to become exhausted from supporting the heavy muscle above began to explode with tonnes, of muscles and strength. The thighs are filled with gigantic muscle which fits well with Heatblast's other body part and his calves muscle which seems like a set of bowling balls being stacked along its calves.

There stood the musclebound hero which is 20 feet tall pile of mountainous pure muscle and strength covered in flame which began to ingnite much more rapidly that is.

"Yeaaaah Im the Super Powercharged HEATBLAST!!! Warghhh!!!!!" Roar Heatblast in a much lower manly tone.

"Well its looks like the tables had turned isn't it" Gloats Heatblast.

(To see how Heatblast looks like, use this link <http://muk100.deviantart.com/art/Max-Heatblast-84278848>)

Heatblast with ease defeats the King and all the other Forever Knights.
132.title: the forever knights are attacking

choices: Increase a little bit coz if so big how can he run fast( Backfires)

"Don't know what that is, but I'll use it", Ben said.'

151.title: Humongousaur

1511.content:
The omnitrix flashed red when he pressed the icon. Ben was surrounded by the light and felt his body changing. His body started increasing in size along with his clothes. He kept growing until 30ft tall.

“Wow im huge.“ Ben said outloud.

The omnitrix then started speaking.

“Repeat process?” It said

Ben wanted to see how big he could get and pressed it again

He kept growing until...
1511.title: Red

15113.content:
Ben was surrounded by the red light again and felt his body grow more and more. He was soon double the height of the tallest trees in the forest yet kept growing.

“This is awesome, im huge and im not even done yet”

Ben Soon reached the 100ft mark. He could see the entire forest from up there. He soon heard someone shouting at him. He looked down to see his now tiny cousin gwen.

“Ben, what did you do to yourself, your gigantic!” Gwen screamed at the top of her lungs.

“Oh you haven’t seen big yet Gwen” Ben said as he kept growing.

He soon reached 250ft, halfway until the growth stopped. He couldn’t hear gwen anymore as he was too high up. He was as tall as the mountains near the forest. The trees didn’t even reach the soles of his feet. He kept growing until finally he reached 500ft.

“Awesome im huge now!” Ben said.

He raised his foot and pressed it down infront of him. He raised it again to see a giant dent in the forest.

Suddenly the omnitrix started speaking again.

“Repeat action?”

Ben immediately pressed the icon again and started growing again until...
15113.title: 500ft

1512.content:
Soon, a blue flash of light appeared all around Ben. Gwen cannot even ting a singl thing what could be happening. "Ben, are you okay?" But she can hear nothing but the sound of the Onitrix. Sue grew worried. "Ben?!" But no response.

Meanwhile, Ben, who was at the center of the blue light, looked around him. His body was changing to the alien shown on the screen. His skin turned green and rough, a spikey, dark blue shell grew on his back, spikes grew on his head, a tail sprouted, though having a mace at it's end, barrels then grew on the knuckles, Ben was becoming more like a Ankylosaurus bipedipal creature, and he grew to 20 feet tall. (this ideas the ultimate form looks like)

But then with that, another wave of change occurs. Ben's mudslides begin to swell in size. his legs, once short and stubby compared to the rest of the body, grew thicker and thicker. Soon, they were three times as wide as they were before. Also, it somewhat grew a bit as well. Ben was no longer 20 feet, but grew to 30 feet as the body began muscle growth. The torso grew larger in size as if a mass of two trucks were added in. His arms also grew thicker as well as the tail, which was also pumped with muscle.

When it was done, what happens next?
1512.title: Blue

15123.content: " Woah this is AMAZING!" yelled Ben. He realised that in order to get inside before anyone saw him, he had to change back. Uh oh. Ben pressed the omnitrix, yet no transformation. He kept pressing but to no avail. Suddenly a car began to pull up. Humungosaur ran to a nearby porta-loo and squezeed inside. However only just, any bigger he would have burst through the roof. The loo walls were straining and the sink had popped off and had begun to flood the cubicle. His tail was getting in the way too much and it almost broke the door down (it actually fell off one hinge!). He slammed down on the omnitrix one last time before it flashed...
15123.title: Ben cannot change back
